name: Touching Me
description:
Touch Me Now is the new game of LapKan Corp.

Game include 8 mini game for you to touch and touch.

Amazing star and everything you can do with your finger.
Funny mini game and attractive mini games.

Addicted game for you.
Play in short time and have fun for a day.

Game is include many mini game that can help to reduce your stress and make you more sensitive to your iPhone.

1. Hitting Star:
- Game from the classic game "Hitting Me". All Star will appear at the line in university and your action is only touch all the star on the screen.
- Try to get best number of star to score your name on the Game Center.

2. Paint Me Now:
- New mini game with star. You need to colour the star to make all star have the same colour and you will get to the new stage.

3. Couple Me:
- You need to touch with 2 fingers on 2 same star until all star gone.


and many more ...

* Feature of game:
- 6 different mini games
- 2 multiplayer games for you to challenge your friends
